Package interfaces

Interface ISkillAnswer

public interface ISkillAnswer
This is an interface for the ISkillAnswer that is required for the skills used by the ConversationsEngine
Author:
Marcel Engelmann

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    List<String> answers()
    Returns a list of answers that are all returned back to the user
    String getTransitionTrigger()
    Returns the transition trigger that defines in which state the skill is supposed to transition to
    Map<String,​String> requiredQuestionsToBeAnswered()
    Returns a Map of questions that are supposed to be asked of the user.
    boolean skipUserOutput()
    If the skill's state machine is supposed to transition from one state to another without responding to the user

  • Method Details

    • getTransitionTrigger

      String getTransitionTrigger()
      Returns the transition trigger that defines in which state the skill is supposed to transition to
      Returns:
      the transition trigger that defines in which state the skill is supposed to transition to

    • requiredQuestionsToBeAnswered

      Map<String,​String> requiredQuestionsToBeAnswered()
      Returns a Map of questions that are supposed to be asked of the user. This Map has the format: <entityName, question>, where the entityName defines the entity that is supposed to be filled
      Returns:
      a Map of questions that are supposed to be asked of the user. This Map has the format: <entityName, question>, where the entityName defines the entity that is supposed to be filled

    • answers

      List<String> answers()
      Returns a list of answers that are all returned back to the user
      Returns:
      a list of answers that are all returned back to the user

    • skipUserOutput

      boolean skipUserOutput()
      If the skill's state machine is supposed to transition from one state to another without responding to the user
      Returns:
      true to skip the response to the user and rerun the skill (after the transition to the next state)
